ðŸ“– Summary: PECKUS is a CircuitPython-based project that creates a presence-enforcing USB storage device. It stores a file (typically a cryptographic key) and only exposes it as a USB drive after successful presence verification, usually via Bluetooth LE. The device automatically relocks after a timeout or when the user's presence is no longer detected, providing an air-gap security benefit.
